item.title: Compiling error Please help
item.dc:creator: @john1716 john1716
item.description:
@john1716 wrote:

where? this is what i got [code] }
}
}
}
public void debug(String text) {
if (debug)
sM(text);
}
public void declineTrade() {
if (disconnected) {
declineTrade(true);
}
declineTrade(true);
}

public void declineTrade(boolean tellOther) {
           client other = getClient(trade_reqId);
	if (tellOther && validClient(trade_reqId)) {
		other.sM("Other player has declined the trade.");
		other.declineTrade(false);
	}

	for (GameItem item : offeredItems) {
		if (item.amount < 1)
			continue;
		if (item.stackable) {
			addItem(item.id, item.amount);
		} else {
			for (int i = 0; i < item.amount; i++) {
				addItem(item.id, 1);
			}
		}
	}
	canOffer = true;
	tradeConfirmed = false;
	tradeConfirmed2 = false;
	offeredItems.clear();
	inTrade = false;
	trade_reqId = 0;
            other.closeInterface();
	other.inTrade = false;
}[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Compiling error Please help
item.dc:creator: @I_need_a_username I need a username
item.description:
@I_need_a_username wrote:

100 errors means you are missing a { or a } somewhere.

Read full topic
